name: Salamander, Wrecking Ball of the Lightsworn
text: You can Special Summon this card from your GY by banishing 1 "Lightsworn" monster from either GY, except "Salamander, Wrecking Ball of the Lightsworn". You can only Special Summon "Salamander, Wrecking Ball of the Lightsworn" once per turn this way. You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Lightsworn" card from your GY or that is banished to your hand. If this card is destroyed: Target 1 LIGHT or DARK monster that is banished; shuffle it into the Deck, then banish this card. You can only use each effect of "Salamander, Wrecking Ball of the Lightsworn" once per turn.
